name: VR Minigolf (mulitasoft)
description:
A tiny WebXR minigolf game in WebXR. It's just an exercise in doing something with WebXR, it's not a fully fledged game but it's fully playable.

Tested on Oculus browser. 

Controls
  • Move by teleporting using forward in the left controller analog stick
  • Press X/A to spawn a ball
  • Change which hand holds the club by pressing the trigger button of the hand you want to use

It's heavily inspired by Walkabout minigolf (like the dynamic club height), it's a great game, go buy it!

Bugs
  • If you swing the club too fast, most of the times the collision is not detected (I know why it happens, but dont't have the time or willingness to fix it!)
  • Sometimes the ball doesn't detect the collision with the level
Credits

Design and programming by Luis Parravicini
